channel.description: Recent content in Pages on lucasmac's blog

item.title: About Lucas M4C
item.description: Born and raised in the land of Cajuína (Teresina, Piauí), Leia’s father, married with Eliane and a geek since childhood. Active in the free software community in Piauí, president of APISoL and co-founder of Teresina Hacker Clube. Lover of gambiarras, robotics and movies. ;)
